theme.name: EducaMadrid (presentaciones)
theme.author: Ignacio Gros
theme.description:
Create presentations with eXe. Easy to use. Responsive design. Design and programming by Ignacio Gros for eXeLearning (http://exelearning.net/).
iDevice icons by Google (https://fonts.google.com/icons), under the 2.0 version of the Apache License (https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html).
Open Sans font family, designed by Steve Matteson. Open Sans License: 2.0 version of the Apache License.
